Logging In to Project Databases or Projects

When you open a project database or project that has been configured to use the Login Dialog login source or uses an access control database that contains user IDs and passwords, you must log into the project database or project once you have opened it.

To log in to a project database or project:

  1. Open the project database or select the project. The Project Database Login dialog box appears.

  2. In the User Name field, enter the user name your administrator has assigned you. User names may or may not be case sensitive, depending on how the project database is configured. Unless the login source is the Login Dialog, the user ID field will already contain a value and cannot be edited.

  3. In the Password field, enter a password if required. Passwords are not required for user names, but if your administrator has specified a password, you must enter it.

  4. If logging in to a subproject with separate access control, select the Remember user name and password for subprojects check box to retain login information for future access.

  5. Click OK. The new user name appears in the status bar.
